main event: A bright light, observed by U.S. Air Force employees, was seen traveling at high speed over Thule AFB, Greenland.
interesting points: The object was described as three times brighter than the brightest star.,Witnesses reported watching the light travel from the south to the north.,The sighting lasted approximately 3-4 minutes before the object faded from view.,The object made an abrupt turn and accelerated away.,No sound or exhaust was perceived during the sighting.
witness description: employees in the United States Air Force as Arctic Rescue experts
